ygData.subject: Re: How to Unsubscribe (was:Re: [eqbards] Quest Gems)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not exactly true, Steve.  As a moderator, I can remove you (and I did remove Brian).  Funny thing is, he s been subscribed since November 1999 - almost as
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:26 PM 8/30/02 -0400, you wrote:
>As with subscribing, the owner of the e-mail address has to unsubscribe
>their self, no one here can do that for you...

Not exactly true, Steve. As a moderator, I can remove you (and I did
remove Brian). Funny thing is, he's been subscribed since November 1999 -
almost as long as I have - and he "doesn't know who we are"???

Freaks.

Heck, I haven't even loaded EQ in over 6 months (beta-testing Earth and
Beyond, plus playing NWN, and about a dozen other games...), so I have no
clue what's going on anymore. But I'm still here for y'all...

C'est la vie.

Talies
